111.content:
Area 11, formerly known as Japan, one of Brittania's many conquered areas used to exemplify its extreme power. Like all of the Areas Area 11 suffered extreme discrimination to its natural citizens. The former Japanese suffered endless abuse from the Brittanians, and many laws bordered on abuse for them and their culture. Of course, due to this rebellion flared, one group in particular stands out among the others; The Black Knights. This one group stood out for many reasons, it didn't settle for mere terrorism it wanted Brittania crushed even if it meant war. Their leader Zero practically defined charisma; he did things that seemed impossible, almost supernatural even, but he did them nonetheless. Perhaps most interesting of all though, was that Zero was in truth the former Brittanian Prince Lelouch Vi Brittania.

Currently the ex-prince was at Ashford Academy, a school he attended under a false name. Despite being a teenager, he used his mind and his Geass to form the greatest threat to Brittania ever. Geass was the secret behind Zero, the power to make people do anything regardless of the situation. Of course such a power has its drawbacks, it grows more powerful and as a result unpredictable at times. The possibility was always there, that this power would develop into something else too, although Lelouch wasn't certain it would even occur. The power might even one day develop into something that turns on Lelouch.

The one who blessed Lelouch with such power was his accomplice C.C.. She was a mysterious girl to be sure, often wearing a straightjacket-like outfit and appearing aloof to the world and all its cruelties. C.C. had bright green hair (Natural too no less), that went all the way down to her midback. Rather voluptous curves, (Which Lelouch paid no mind), and obvious wisdom beyond belief. She blessed Lelouch with Geass and is unable to die, making her his greatest ally in his war against Brittania.

Right now Lelouch and C.C. were inside his room at Ashford Academy, Lelouch eagerly working away at Black Knight affairs on his computer and C.C. impatiently awaiting a pizza to come. Lelouch eyed her impatient form with a grimace, "When it does come you better make sure to eat it in the dining room. I'm tired of having to clean pizza crumbs off of my bed."

The girl turned her head from the door to Lelouch, "What if someone sees me? You're always yelling at me for being in public sight."

"And you always ignore me anyway." Lelouch sighed.

C.C. smirked, "So you are learning after all. Fine, I'll eat in the dining room to make you happy but you owe me."

"I give you a place to live, all the pizza you can eat, and even hide you from the police...."

C.C. threw her favorite plush toy, the Pizza Hut mascot Cheese-Kun at him; it bounced off with a short squeek, "I gave you Geass. You owe me." Lelouch didn't comment.

A few minutes passed, wordless for both Lelouch and C.C. a loud doorbell seemed to echo. The two stared at eachother for a moment, before C.C. clicked her tongue. "Fine..... I'll answer it." The girl got up and walked out of the room, her boots clacking on the floor was the only sound Lelouch heard as she went down the halls.

'Finally some peace and q-urg!" Lelouch cringed in agony as his eye seemed to throb in immense pain. It felt like someone had shot Lelouch in his eye it hurt so bad, but...it wasn't a new pain. My...my Geass!

Images cycled before Lelouch's mind, images of the world over the many years, images of circumstances experienced by someone else, and most notably, an image of a blonde boy with hair that reached all the way to his feet. Just looking at him Lelouch had the feeling he was staring at someone just like C.C.. He found himself in a pure white void, only him and the boy present within.

The boy smirked, "So you are the seed of Charles who has strayed from his path. Do you really think yourself worthy of even commanding a single soldier?"

Hearing his father's name Lelouch instinctively gritted his teeth, "What do you know about that man!? Who are you?!"

"Someone who knows much Little Lelouch." The boy cryptically replied, he turned around and seemed to sneer, "Including the fate of your late Mother."

Lelouch would've jumped at the boy and attacked if he could, but his body seemed locked in place. "What do you know about my Mother's death?!"

"Everything. And I will tell you...for a price."

Lelouch calmed slightly, but still appeared tense, "What price?"

The boy looked back with a calm smirk, "Nothing big, just a sort of...test. A test to see if you are really worthy of the power you possess."

Lelouch couldn't help but wonder if the boy meant his Geass, the Black Knights, or some other ability, but he replied with a regal calmness. "And if I undergo this test you will tell me the truth behind my mother's murder?"

"Anything is possible."

Every possible meaning of that one sentence played in Lelouch's mind and again he found himself swelling with rage, "You wouldn't tell me even if I underwent this test would you!?" He was now screaming at this boy.

Yet the boy maintained a steady calm, "No, I said anything is possible. I may tell you, I may not, it depends on how this test plays out."

Lelouch's mind racked the possibilities, this was his greatest clue to the murder of his mother....but to trust a complete stranger? Every logical part of Lelouch screamed to refuse, but his heart told him to try and find the truth regarding his mother. He looked at the boy with a stern expression, "I'll do it. Tell me the details of this test of yours."

The boy appeared slightly surprised, but also amused. "You'll figure it out in time, but I will tell you one thing. Depending on how things play out, you may very well end up in this test for the rest of your life. It may never end. You may live your life trapped in what may be considered a game."

Lelouch didn't even falter slightly, "How am I to ascertain the details of this test then?"

He was answered with a shrug, "You're smart, you should figure it out. And if you don't then you really don't deserve the knowledge anyway. Even knowing this do you still agree?"

"Yes, I accept the terms of your pathetic test. And watch me pass it with ease!!"

The boy chuckled, "We shall see....hehe Lelouch we shall see...." The white void of a world the two were in seemed to blurr, the boy slowly vanishing as Lelouch's pysche left the world. Only to return to the world Lelouch's actual body was in.

Grunting slightly he opened his eyes, he was on the floor, apparently falling unconcious at some point. But other than that nothing seemed too different, the room seemed off a tad but Lelouch was probably disoriented. He rose to his feet, disappointed nothing happened. "I swear to god if that was just some hallucination from lack of sleep I-" He cut himself short as his eyes came to face with something amazing. C.C.'s Cheese-Kun which she had thrown at him before was like a mountain before Lelouch, its form seemed absolutely godly in size, even larger than some buildings. It was then that Lelouch realized why his room seemed off, everything was far too big. The swivel chair Lelouch sat in before rose miles into the sky. The bed seemed to be several thousand feet up, Lelouch had shrunken!

He fell to his knees in awe as the reality gripped him, he was a centimeter...no...closer to half a centimeter tall, in a world of people who's stray hairs could crush him. It was so...jaw dropping, just Lelouch somehow managed to regain some form of composure after a few seconds. I need....to think....this is obviously my test...but what I am supposed to do? Trying to survive is too simple, that boy wants me to do something while I'm like this.....but what?

Lelouch's thoughts were interrupted by a sound that made his heart stop, his bedroom door was opening. He turned to look at who had entered, hopefully they could help him. It was....

(IMPORTANT. Please, for all readers and writers to know keep this in mind. This is taking place during R1!!!)
111.title: A Test to Find out the Truth

1111.content:
"C.C...?" Lelouch muttered, rubbing his eyes with a groan "I told her not to eat in here..."

"Lelouch...?" C.2 spoke innocently as her cat like eyes prowled the room carefully. Her ears twitch slightly to every noise in the house as her hair shifted in the wind of the open window. One last glance convinced her that he was gone.

The green haired girl raised her eyebrows with a grin as her majestic, white, high-heeled boots stormed into the room with a calm tapping noise as her thin nimble fingers put down a open can of coke on the floor by Lelouch’s bed side. C.C let her dripping wet tongue slip out from her tender lips to catch an escaping bead of coke as she wandered around the bed, not noticing a drop of saliva tracing around her chin to meet Lelouch on the floor.

“Hey!” Lelouch screamed as C.C stepped over him with a tiny drop of saliva falling over him. “Gack… C.C! Get out of my room! Damn it! Where’s the kid that shrank me?! I’m so going to kick his arse!” Lelouch fumed, rubbing his temple to try and calm himself. “Ok… think Lelouch… what do I need to do?”

“Ahhh” C.C said as she opened her moist lips as far as they could stretch to catch a drooping piece of cheese from her pizza slice. Her yellow eyes rolled over towards the window briefly to guide her hand into closing and locking it firmly shut before tossing the pizza box and her slice upon the bed with a dud thud. She let the piece she had in her mouth slide down her throat with a blissful gulp before she reached down and slid off her long boots with a blissful look in her eyes. “That’s better… “ She mumbled once the boots were kicked to one side.

“Oh damn…” Lelouch murmured as he waved his arms towards C.C as she quickly rubbed and wiggled her toes, “Please don’t walk this way… Please don’t…”

C.C stood up tall, gazing around the room one last time before wandering forward. She cleared her throat and swiped back her luscious hair as she traced the tip of her fingers over the corner of the bed. She stepped over her little pizza hut plushie straight onto Lelouch’s tiny body before moving the pizza onto the floor next to her drink. She hopped onto the bed, her ears pricked to the sound of the bed springs giving way to her weight.
“Lelouch wouldn’t mind me crashing here” C.C spoke with a smirk as her toes playfully peeled off her white socks. Her hand meanwhile drifted blindly down for her slice of pizza as she gazed aimlessly towards the ceiling. Her fingers prodded the wooden floor first, before delicately probing towards a floor mat Lelouch had put down. Her hand’s brushed over Lelouch briefly before snatching up a pizza slice to dangle over her head as she sat up with her feet crossed yet her knees bent. Her hand slowly grinded into the poor pillow as the springs of the mattress creaked to her adjusting weight.

“Ouch…” Lelouch murmured as he pried himself from the fading imprint C.C left on his floor mat. His head swam in the dark for a second before shaking himself out of it. “Ok… ok… I really need a plan… there’s no way that I can go about this so-called ‘test’ headfirst all the time… C.2 almost killed me even though it was an accident…” Lelouch looked around, trying to come up with inspiration as C.C’s socks finally fell from her feet to wind up on the floor.

5 Minutes slowly tick by as Lelouch thinks up a plan.
“It might not be great…” Lelouch murmured “But it’s the best I have… I can either attempt to climb onto my bed and try to get C.C’s attention… “ Lelouch groaned as he gazed upwards towards the edge of the creaking bed. “Or I can get a lift on a pizza slice… I’ll just jump off at the top… or it might end up like bungie jumping with all the string cheese… and C.C loves to catch the stringy bits on her tongue…

http://neoshinka.files.wordpress.com/200...

I’m sure she would notice me then though… who wouldn’t?” Lelouch tilted his head towards the worn socks on the floor. “No doubt she’ll wear them again after she’s brushed the crumbs onto my bed… she would defiantly feel me under her sole if nothing else. Plus she has to look in the socks direction… right?”

http://daigard123.deviantart.com/art/CC-...

11113.content:
As much as it pained Lelouch to admit it, he had only one real option he'll wait on C.C.'s socks and pray to god the woman sees her. It was a bit....humiliating but realistically speaking it was the best plan. Lelouch, being physically challenged, did not in any possible way have the physical ability to successfully climb his bed; especially with C.C. moving about on top of it. Trying to work his was onto a slice of pizza could happen but it was too likely Lelouch would get stuck, and then get a one way trip to C.C.'s mouth; plus the grease would really agitate him. While his pride seemed to despise the idea Lelouch began walking towards C.C's discarded socks.

Getting there was little problem, C.C. always took extra time to fully enjoy her pizza so Lelouch easily had half an hour; so even at his size of..perhaps half a centimeter tall he had the luxury of walking to his destination and still arriving with time to spare. Give or take a minute Lelouch had ten minutes to think things through, so he sat himself on the heap of cloth known as C.C.'s sock and began to think. To the side Lelouch could see C.C. lift up the last slice of her pizza, meaning not much waiting left.

Lelouch really prayed his plan worked, not only because it would mean he would still be in direct danger but also C.C.'s sock smelled, and her feet did, and her boots probably did, and Lelouch did not want to have to keep tolerating it.

God that woman is stubborn/ Lelouch thought with a grimace, before this ordeal he once had the..."pleasure" of experiencing this odor, and immediately he began making preparations to buy C.C. several pairs of shoes and socks. But the girl was too stubborn to wear them. She wore only the boots and socks Lelouch found her with, always claiming they were broken in perfectly. They were comfortable Lelouch was sure but...the odor...he really prayed never to experience it again. As such this made his current predicament even worse. At his size the odor around Lelouch had intensified to the point he could practically see it, and the spongy sweat soaked cloth he sat on did little to help. But with discipline Lelouch managed to block it out and refocus on his situation.

That mysterious boy...he said this was a test, but a test of what? Survival would be obvious, in fact too obvious , Lelouch's test had to be something aside from that...but what? He had to figure out soon, lest he spend the rest of his life the size of a speck of dirt. Lelouch shuddered at the idea and thought everything over. What was he supposed to do?

------------------------

C.C. thoroughly enjoyed nippling away at her pizza; god it tasted so good...sometimes she wished she was the size of an ant in a box of the stuff....she would happily live her life on a slice. Sadly, all good things had to come to an end and with a final bite the enjoyment from the pizza ended. C.C. didn't bother moving for a moment, just relishing the faint taste lingering in her mouth.

The bed supporting her was comfortable, and with the pizza crumbs on it, it was even moreso. But when Lelouch returns he would yell about it all...why couldn't he just love pizza? A sudden chill in the air made goosebumps break out along C.C.'s delicate skin.

That's another thing, why does he have to have the air conditioning set so low I can see my breath? If that damn thermostat didn't need a password I'd be much happier...maybe I'll bring it up when Lelouch gets back. C.C. eyed herself with bored eyes, "Guess I better put something on my feet before I catch a cold." Not even looking to the side of the bed C.C. groped for her socks.

------------------------------------

When C.C. said that sentence Lelouch braced himself. Faint booms came from C.C.'s fingers as they ran along the floor, soon grasping her sock. With no delay she lifted it and Lelouch up, it was a miracle he managed to hold on; but somehow he did. His hands held the opening of C.C.'s sock as his voice tried to scream to get her attention.

"C.C.! You witch look at me! I'm right here! C.C.!!" As expected C.C. didn't hear him, nor was she expected to but Lelouch had to try. He tightened his hands further as the giantess gave her sock one firm shake to straighten it out. Her eyes still barely gave her sock a glance as her left foot rose into the air. Lelouch turned slightly green at the sight, C.C.'s foot was soft and delicate and all but it was also decorated in an assortment of pizza crumbs and dirt; the troublesome girl found bathing more than once a week a "Pain" and as a result...build up on her foot occured.

"God she better see me...." Lelouch did not want to join the toejam he saw anytime soon.

Slowly C.C. began to edge her toes into her sock, and Lelouch gave one last bellow.

"C.C.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

C.C. paused, her face bearing an odd expression....

111132.content:
"Choo.." C2 sneazed gentally, dusting Lelouch off and into the bowles of her sock. She shook her head gentally before giving a quick examination of her grimy sock. Her foot fell gracefully to the ground as she rose the sock to her nose, scrunching it in her hand like a stress ball, tieing lelouch up in the fibers of her sock. She gave a quick sniff,
"Gack! I realy need to throw this in the wash sometime..." Her nose wrinkles as she moved the sock away violently. Her mind ticked over lazyness, "Well.. I can't smell it if its down there.." Her shoulders raised and fell as she looked at the sock, then her boot with uncaring eyes. With a simple toss of her head, she flicked her hair to one side before wiggling her toes into the sock opening, steamroling over lelouches miniscule form as her freezing cold toes subconciously wrapped around lelouches warm body.

Tormented, humiliated and gasping for air, even before C.C had put on her sock, Lelouch knew he wouldn't survive the day in this new, foul prison.
"C.C! I command you.. s..stop!" Lelouch cried out, his geass usless to stop the pizza girls toes ome in to use him as a personal foot warmer. As her toes surrounded him, shuffelling him from toe space to toespace absentmindedly, slowly cleaning C.C's grimy foot as it tried to get warm.

C.C snapped out of her zoned out daydreaming as she found her other sock. Her hands whisked it away as she slid her other foot under the bed. Without much care, she slid her foot into the sock while wondering what else she could do.
"Another pizza would be nice..." She spoke heavenly, standing up atop of Lelouch as she shut her eyes and stretched her arms high in the air. She let out a releaved sigh as she wandered forward, rubbing her eyes as she knocked the phone out of the reciever and started to place an order.

11132.content:
Of all the people to enter Lelouch's room in his situation...it had to be her; Milly Ashford. the blonde, sexy school girl that practically ran Ashford Academy. It wasn't that Milly was a bad person or anything, it was just...Milly wasn't exactly a safe person to be around either. Most people prioritized school, friends, those sort of things, Milly made fun her Number One priority. It didn't matter how grave the situation, how serious things were, Milly always had an attitude that was far too carefree. In fact, the only time this ever changed was if someone she cared about was in life threatening trouble, which was not the current case technically speaking. Put simply, she was the worst possible person to arrive at this time.

Lelouch felt the horror show itself on his face as the giantess strode in with a sexy stride, her black socks gently patting the floor with an almost...alluring rhythm. Wearing the typical Ashford girl uniform Milly laid a hand on her hip, "Now where is that man? I wanted to have some fun." Milly impatiently tapped her toes before Lelouch, casting a shadow over him with each toe.

Even in the grave situation where Milly's toes could crush him, Lelouch couldn't stop his eyes from trailing along Milly's gigantic, and overall stunning, body. The tightly fitting ankle socks that led up to her well toned calves...then her amazing thighs, and of course the miniskirt Lelouch could see up, and the girl's face was obscured by her large breasts. Even though the situation was as bad as humanly possible, Lelouch couldn't help but feel a tad aroused. Milly was beautiful after all, and in her current size...Lelouch's teenage hormones were working against him.

Then Milly's toes nearly crushed the fallen prince.

It wasn't a special movement or anything that caused it; Milly just slid the ball of her foot forward a couple inches, and with Lelouch distracted, he didn't notice it. Then she began tapping her toes again, one grazing Lelouch, the other nearly landing right on him. If Milly's second toe hadn't alerted the youth, he would've likely ended up beneath Milly's big toe at that moment, possibly even dying from it. But Lelouch did realize it, and managed to leap away in time.

Focus! This is no time to be a normal teenager! Milly is giant, and I need to get her attention. Even if she acts like...Milly it's better than risking my life down here!

Still, easier said than done...much easier. Lelouch was smaller than a toe, Milly was not. For Lelouch to get her attention it would be like an ant attempting to get her attention. No easy feat, especially considering Lelouch had ZERO physical skills. He tried with an obvious approach, screaming for Milly's attention. But like an ant's noises, Lelouch's weren't even close to being heard. What to do what to do...

While Lelouch tried planning something out Milly sat herself right on his bed, stretching her legs out. "Aww...I guess I'll have to play with someone else...but who? Shirley and Nina are in class. Rivalz is out gambling and Nunnally is no fun...Wah! Where is Lelouch when you need him?!"

Lelouch stared bewildered as Milly's feet rose through the air to the floor back and forth in the simplest of motions. Nothing could really describe it, the fluidness of the motions...even Knightmare's could achieve such a thing at their size, and Milly was doing it at over a dozen times that! The wiggling of her toes, the movements of her legs...with Milly's gigantic size it seemed almost...fascinating. Scientists always tried to achieve that type of movement with Knightmares, and yet they could never achieve it, and here Lelouch was witnessing a mile-high school girl perform what scientists failed to do for years. At his size every motion stood out, and Lelouch was amazed by the complexity of it all. He was smart and everything but he never truly grasped the complexity of the human body, even with Milly's simple motions it seemed amazing. He took mental notes to try and talk to Rakshata about later.

Then Milly planted her feet on the ground, gently rubbing the socks against the wooden floors. She was silent in thought, as was Lelouch, and seeing Milly's feet on the floor gave him an idea...a very...very...nausiating idea. How did bugs get a persons attention? Biting them. So if Lelouch were really the size of a bug...then the same principal would apply right? Lelouch nervously approached Milly's shifting foot. His plan was great in theory but the socks could pose a problem...what if his teeth didn't sink in deep enough? Lelouch basically would have bitten a sock for nothing; and the taste of feet was not something he wanted to experience without need. Lelouch took a deep breath, and waited for his chance.

At that exact moment Milly stopped her foot's movement for a moment, and Lelouch took his chance.

With comically slow running, Lelouch approached Milly's left foot. Before anything could go wrong or he overthought it, Lelouch leaped up and sank his teeth deep into Milly's sock. For a second it seemed as if his plan would work, Lelouch's teeth went deeper in than expected, and soon they even broke through to the other side. The taste would be one that would haunt the young prince for all his life, the saltiness of sweat, a dirt taste from walking around, and the bad taste of cloth in his mouth, all together it...was horrifying to say the least. And it almost seemed worth it when Lelouch was on the verge of breaking through and achieving his motive, but just as his teeth neared Milly's foot, Lelouch couldn't push any further. To be frank, it was amazing his teeth went through all of Milly's sock; but it didn't matter. Because it didn't work. The prince yanked his mouth out with disappointment and looked at what he managed to do, make a small hole in Milly's sock.

But then something unexpected happened, Milly began tapping her toes again. That much was no big deal, but the subtle motions of her foot in doing so...they were making the hole Lelouch made bigger! Soon it became big enough to even fit him! Another idea quickly formed, albeit far more reckless. Lelouch could jump in and bite Milly's foot point blank, but this risked him ending up in that sock, or worse...Milly thinking he liked her feet...ugh.

Nothing left to lose...Lelouch sighed and plunged in headfirst. His body went in about...halfway before there was no room to go any further, leaving Lelouch's legs humorously dangling from outside Milly's sock with the rest of him inside, face rubbed against Milly's sole. Right away a stale air worked its way into Lelouch's nostril, not really bad...just...stale, with a hint of foot in it. As to be expected in the closed space of a sock, didn't make it any better though. Before Lelouch cowarded out from the smell he bit Milly's foot again, this time drawing a trickle of blood (which oddly, tasted sorta good.)

Right away Milly responded, "...Ow!" And the blonde giantess investigated her foot for whatever bit her. "Where is that bug..."

Lelouch prayed he would be found.
