Somewhat beginning to enjoy the expansive size difference between herself and her captive, Euphie smiled as she gradually bent downwards towards her foot, making sure not to accidentally crush anything with her large breasts as her chest soon was positioned directly in front of the tiny speck of a cosmic entity known as Earth. Moving her right arm very slowly, the colossal princess eventually positioned her index finger right next to her pinky toe, annihilating an area of more than 3000 square miles with her finger’s impact on the planet. With a quick movement of her appendage, Euphemia scooped up Kallen from beneath her toe and quickly curled her finger against her palm once the bunny girl was in her possession; since the speed of the Brittanian’s movements was so incredibly fast, the former Black Knight did not have any time to begin a quick growth spurt before her body was restrained once again, the minuscule CC still trapped in her bust as well. With a playful giggle, Euphemia’s smile slightly widened as she formed her hand into a complete fist and gently began to raise it to her eye level while simultaneously removing her foot from the planet’s surface, leaving an immense imprint of her toe into the earth’s crust, its depth piercing into the earth’s magma mantle and spanning a horizontal distance of over 10000 miles.

“Now, where was I...?” Euphemia asked herself aloud. “Ah yes, I remember now. I owe you an etiquette lesson, don’t I? Well, let’s begin shall we? When addressing royalty such as myself, you are to refer to them using their noble title before calling them by name. For example, I am Princess Euphemia li Brittania. Now, you try it.”

The stubborn redhead quickly gathered a small amount of saliva in her mouth and spit as far as she possibly could onto the top right portion of Euphemia’s fist. “Go to hell, you worthless Brittanian piece of garbage!”

The colossal noble slowly closed her eyes and shook her head from side to side in utter disappointment. “Tisk, tisk, tisk. Can’t even do that, I see. Well, perhaps a little bit of discipline will change your tone...”

Gently, the gargantuan catgirl clenched her right fist tighter, causing her captive to let out loud, agonizing screams of pain as a smirk crossed Euphie's face. “This is for all those you hurt with your fighting on the planet!” Euphie quickly clenched her fist as hard as she possibly could then quickly released her grip to its previous strength, the sudden movement forcing the minuscule Area 11 revolutionary to yell out in sheer anguish, the sudden stress placed upon her body almost causing all 5 lumbar bones in her spinal column to break simultaneously. “So, are you ready to cooperate now and face the justice you so rightly deserve?”
132311111111122211.title: Euphemia's Dominance

1323111111111222111.content:
“Justice?” Kallen repeated as she spat on Euphemia, “How is this justice?! All I wanted was to return my people back to their former glory…a glory you Brittanian scum took from us!”

“You were going power mad and destroying the world beneath your feet!”

“And you weren’t?! Look at your handiwork your Highness.” Kallen gestured to the planet by Euphie’s feet, littered with craters and partially demolished from Euphie’s toe on it minutes before. “My battle for Japan might cost a few thousand lives, but you wiped out millions!”

Euphie backed away, or…floated away as it was. The horror in her eyes was clear, her resolve weakened, “…But…I…”

Kallen grinned; this was just what she needed. “You what? You focused so much on growth you forgot about the world around you? You wiped out half the planet just to capture one girl? You’re a Brittanian alright. No empathy, no feelings for the people.”

The giant Princess faltered again, her grip on Kallen weakening. “B-But…”

“No buts! You have to be held accountable for your actions Princess!” Euphie continued to falter, her grip nearly vanishing entirely. Another push and it would be over and done with. “How does it feel knowing you killed your own family…? Your beloved sister…?”

That was it, Euphie was finished. Kallen readied herself to grow back into victory as her hand began to slide open, but a voice commanded Euphemia otherwise. “Don’t let her manipulate you Euphemia.” The voice was completely monotone, devoid of any emotion. Kallen clicked her tongue, Damn, forgot about her.

Realizing what had almost happened, Euphie tightened her grip again. “Where did that voice come from?”

“You seem to have forgotten there were two women fighting before you arrived.”

Euphie remembered right away, “You’re that green-haired woman that was trying to stop this girl?”

“That is correct.”

“Where are you?”

“There should be a green dot hidden away in the cleavage of the girl you’re holding.”

Upon further examination Euphie realized C.C. was right, hidden deep within the red bug she held was a smaller green one, held right in the cleavage of the woman. Euphie poked her free hand’s nail as close as it could go, “Can you reach that?”

C.C. reached from the depths of Kallen’s cleavage to grab Euphie’s nail, a large, piercing blade that was dangerously close to Kallen’s throat, not that it bothered the immortal girl . With her captor unable to move it was no problem at all freeing herself and climbing on Euphie’s nail.

Euphie brought her closer to her eyes, “Thank you for stopping me from letting this criminal go. What is your name?”

“Call me C.C.”

The Princess blinked, initials? Certainly odd…although not much odder than three giantesses who outsized each other. “Thank you C.C…I may have destroyed so much, but the least I can do is prevent this woman-”

“Kallen.”

“-Kallen from destroying the rest of the world.”

C.C. looked back to the planet far below. Being the smallest, she could best see the state of affairs; the Earth wasn’t fairing too well to say the least. “Actually Princess…I have a different idea…”

The Princess tiled her head to the side, “An idea? What is it?”

The witch didn’t mince words, “Destroy the Earth.”

“What?! Why would you even suggest something like that!?”

C.C. stared unflinchingly into the eyes that dwarfed her, “Because you don’t see what I see. That world is no longer hospital. One half is already gone and wiped out, the other half is suffering in an upturned world as the results of our giant squabble tear the environment to shreds. It’d be an act of mercy to ease their suffering.”

Euphie opened her mouth to speak, but found no words. The inner turmoil of such an act battled with in her, but deep down she knew C.C. was right. “But…But I can’t!”

“Let me free and I’ll wipe it out with you!” Kallen called from below.

C.C. ignored her, “I figured as much, so I propose an alternative. A contract.”

“Contract?”

C.C. laid a hand against the nail she was on, sending a cycle of images through Euphemia’s mind. “Yes, a contract for power…It will isolate you. Such is the fate of those who wield the Power of Kings. But it will give you the power to defy Destiny itself. You will become more; you will gain a power unlike any other. Do you accept this contract?”

Euphie gulped, this contract she was offered sounded scary. She didn’t understand what she was seeing; it was like watching a thousand years of history flying by in seconds. What had she gotten herself into? Regardless, it was the only option she had…in this world of her mind Euphie spoke in a regal voice. “I, Euphemia Li Brittania accept this contract!”

Back in reality, Euphie looked down to the green dot on her fingernail, eyes red with a familiar sigil on them...The power of the Kings...Geass
1323111111111222111.title: Obtaining a Higher Power

choices: The Goddesses decide to play with their worshipper for a bit first
13231111111112221111.content:
Euphie said no words; she only looked to the one who gave her this power of Geass. Her body was acting of its own accord, looking to C.C. with such a deep focus it almost made her dizzy. Why she was doing it, she didn’t know. But it was having a surprising effect; C.C. was growing! A reddish aura surrounded the woman, and slowly her body grew from more than a speck. Soon she was Kallen’s size, and later she was beyond that. C.C., not showing any sign of surprise, leapt away from Euphie towards an empty spot in space; where her growth continued without fear of interruption. Euphie and Kallen watched in shock (and the latter’s horror) as C.C.’s expanding frame soon came to half Euphie’s size, quickly moving past that until she was even to Euphie in every way. She was across from the Princess, facing the other side of the Earth. As the growth came to a halt Euphie snapped out of her trance, eyes reverting to normal. “W-What just happened…?”

C.C. spoke as if nothing had even happened, “That is the power you have been given Euphemia. The power to determine the size of anything and everything.” She stopped to look at Kallen, petrified by the sight of another bigger than her. A small smirk formed, “How does it feel being an insect to me again Kallen?”

The redhead was unable to speak.

Euphie gasped, “You mean…I can change anything’s size now?” She looked back to the Earth, could she go back and live her life?

The giant green-haired girl followed her gaze, “Yes, but as I said to you before. That planet is no longer a place to live. It’d be far better to just wipe it out than let the people suffer.”

“But I can’t do that…”

“Which is why I am here.” C.C. positioned her big and second toes around the chaotic planet. “Give the word and I will do it.”

“But…what about everyone still alive? I can’t forsake all of them.”

“They are already forsaken.”

“B-Bu-“

“You’ve have been granted authority Euphemia. Now choose! Let the people suffer or ease their pain?” There was nothing else to be said, C.C. was right and Euphemia knew it. So, with a heavy heart, she did what she knew to be best. She nodded and right away, C.C. clenched her toes together. The lives of the remaining millions vanished in an instant. All that remained was the debris between the green-haired giantess’ toes.

The realization struck the Princess suddenly, instantly she kneeled over and began to cry, releasing Kallen in order to cover her tearing eyes. Finally seeing a chance, Kallen focused on growing yet again, but similar to Euphie, C.C. grabbed her before she got the chance. She paid the redhead no mind though; her eyes were only filled with concern for the weeping Princess. She embraced the girl in her arms, “You did well Euphemia…You saved millions from a hellish fate.”

“But I killed them!”

“You chose Death instead of a painful Life. It was a tough decision, but you chose the right choice. It may be the first time, but it won’t be the last. Such is the curse of people like us.” C.C. stuck the flowing pink hair of her Highness.

“…Like…us…?”

C.C. brought Euphie’s face up to hers, “I told you. Accepting that contract gave you a power, it made you more. You are now a higher being, and because of you, I am now one too. We are Goddesses now. Beings in charge of Life and Death.”

The word made Euphie freeze in stunned amazement, “Goddesses…?”

“Correct. And we never need to be alone. We can be one another’s companion, their friend…even their lover. We will run this universe as the Goddesses it needs.”

A faint blush formed on Euphie face, “…Lovers…?” Her face began to unconsciously lean forward, as did C.C.’s. “Yes, we’re all each other has, we need to make the most of it…” Their noses touched and they paused, expecting one to lead them through the final step. It was soon made as a joint decision, their lips embraced for the first of many times. Euphie’s heart fluttered in a way she never felt before, even Suzaku hadn’t ever made her feel quite like this. The pink-haired Goddess truly felt like C.C. could be all she ever needed. Their lips pulled apart and Euphie looked to her companion with a mixture of adoration and joy.

“I…never knew I could enjoy something like this…”

C.C. smiled, “You’d be surprised what you can be capable of Goddess Euphemia…”

Euphie chuckled, “That will take some getting used to…” A stray thought wandered into her mind, “…Wait…what about Kallen?”

C.C. brought the miniscule redhead near their faces, her form held firmly between two fingers. “All Goddesses need a worshipper. Perhaps we need to ensure she doesn’t try to outsize us though?”

Euphie looked to the redhead, the Geass sigil appearing again. A red light bathed the girl in its glow, but nothing else happened. “She…shouldn’t be able to grow anymore…I’m still new with this power though.”

C.C. confidently slipped the girl into her vast cleavage, “I know you did a good job…” She pulled Euphie closer for another kiss…
13231111111112221111.title: The Rise of Two Goddesses

The building Zero was on started to shrink.
1451.content:
The Empire of Britannia fought for world domination. Nothing had seemed to be able to stop them, but one day, the mysterious Zero appeared in Area 11 and led a rebellion which was growing stronger every day. Zero, who was actually Lelouche, a former Britannian prince. If things continue that way, he might even be able to stop the empire. V2 could not let that happen. He had to make sure his and his brother’s plan would succeed. Luckily, after years of research, the order had found a way to create a new kind of Geass. A Geass that would not influence people’s minds, but reality itself. He did not know yet if it would work and how powerful that Geass would be, but surely no-one would be able to rival such power. Unfortunately, V2 was not able to gain a Geass himself, so he had to find another person to bestow it onto. And he already had the right person in mind.



The city had been evacuated as the rebellion army approached. They had secured the place and now, they were taking cover between the buildings. The Tokyo settlement was near, but the Britannian army blocked their way. Their enemies were about to attack, so Zero was waiting, using the terrain to his advantage. They would crush the enemy troops and then, they could attack the settlement directly. Soon, Area 11 would be free. Then, hope would spread across the world and more rebellions would break out. Zero smiled behind his mask. Victory was getting closer with each passing day.

„Zero, the enemy started his attack, but…“ It was Kallen. She approached Zero, but something seemed wrong.

„What is it?“, he asked.

„Well, only one Knightmare is attacking. The rest of the army is still waiting.“

„What? Is it Suzaku, again?“ Confused, Zero went outside to get a clearer view of the situation. It was true. One single Knightmare was approaching. But it was not his friend and rival. Instead, it was the personal Knightmare of Cornelia. „Is this some kind of trap?“ Zero’s thoughts were racing. Was it a decoy? But why? Anyway, he had to act, fast. Cornelia’s Knightmare had already entered the city and showed no sign of stopping. „Attack!“, Zero commanded. The Knightmares positioned nearby opened fire and destroyed the enemy’s vehicle with ease. Zero took a binocular and looked closer. Impossible, in between the Knightmare-wreck stood Cornelia, unharmed. Not even her clothes were damaged, save for some dust on them. „What kind of trick is this?“

Then, to Zero’s horror, he saw a red Geass blinking in Cornelia’s eyes. But before he was able to recover from this shock, something else happened that made his jaw drop. Cornelia started growing. First slowly, then speeding up until she stopped at around 200 feet tall. „Today, this little rebellion ends. Surrender now. If you insist on struggling, you will be crushed like the insects you are!“, she declared with one hand on her hips and a superior smile on her face.

Zero finally closed his mouth and gritted his teeth. That was unexpected, but he would not fail just because his enemy surprised him. „She might be bigger, but that does not make her invincible! Attack her with full strength! Show the Britannians that the higher you are, the deeper you will fall!“ Encouraged by the words of their leader, the rebels overcame their shock, let out numerous battle cries and started shooting.

However, Cornelia was way faster than her size should allow her to be. She dashed forward as multiple rockets exploded behind her. She crushed the closest Knightmare under one of her boots, then kicked another one into a building. Still, she was standing in the middle of the rebel’s Knightmares and bullets were hailing on her from all directions.

But to his frustration, Zero had to find out that Cornelia’s skin seemed to have gotten more resistant as well. Most bullets just bounced off and yet… He smiled triumphantly as he saw that after a while, wounds started to form on her body. Cornelia’s face changed from furious to painful. She looked around, saw a gab between two buildings and dashed through it, kicking the Knightmares which were positioned there away. „She must not flee!“, Zero shouted. The rebels charged after her, continuing their assault.

But suddenly, Cornelia stopped, taking cover behind a tall building. Then, her voice echoed again across the city. „It seems I was over-confident. I thought I could take you out at that size, but I was wrong. Well then, how about this?“ With that, her Geass was glowing again. The rebels stopped and watched in awe and horror, as the princess was growing again. Higher and higher she rose into the air, until her head was visible over the building. The Knightmares which had charged after her turned around and fled from the princess of battle, who was now more like a goddess of war. An angry goddess.

Zero cursed as he had to watch helplessly when Cornelia ran towards the city’s center again, casually crushing Knightmares under her boots. Each of her steps made the ground shake and the few rockets that were shot by some remaining brave soldiers just bounced off ineffectively. Kallen looked at the 1000 feet Britannian princess, then at Zero. „W…what should we do?“ „Let me think!“ Zero turned around, walking in circles. The noise created by Cornelia’s footsteps made it hard for him to focus. They could not face her openly anymore. She was just too big. But they had been prepared for an attack of a superior foe. Of course, they were thinking of a large army, not a giant woman, but still, the traps they had build should also work on her.

„Detonate the bombs in the underground structure!“ Under the city, there was a vast and deep network of tunnels. The sewers, but also remains of some underground facilities. Upon detonating the bombs, the ground beneath Cornelia gave in and she fell. To her, it was not deep, but she still sank in almost to her knees. That was enough to make her fall. „Now, the buildings!“ More bombs exploded and let the surrounding buildings collapse upon the titanic princess. She screamed in pain. „Now, finish her off!“ Filled with new hope, the rebels opened fire on Cornelia again. After almost a minute of shooting, Zero commanded them to stop.

As the dust lifted, a victorious smile formed on his face. Cornelia lay there, covered in wreckage, multiple wounds on her body. „You did it!“, Kallen said happily. Zero nodded, but then, another thought crossed his mind. „The Britannian army!“ He looked again toward the enemy, but their troops still did not move. Then, he could feel his blood freeze as he heard a rumbling noise. Looking down on Cornelia, he had to watch in shock as she slowly rose up again. You could see her feeling pain with every move, but her wounds were slowly disappearing. Then, as she looked up, directly staring at the rooftop of the highest building, Zero’s current position, the rebel leader had to take a step back. Cornelia’s face was a mask of pure anger. „Zero!“, she screamed. „You will pay for this!“ Zero could feel his hands starting to shake as he had to watch powerlessly when Cornelia made her next move.
1451.title: Goddess of War

choices: Zero forces Cornelia to retreat for now.
The two Geass' interference has a side-effect.
14512.content:
Suddenly, the building started to sink into the ground. But there was no rumbling or shaking. Confused, Zero looked over the edge of the roof. The base of the building was fine. But strangely, the ground around it seemed to move away. Finally, he realized what was going on. The building was somehow shrinking. Even worse, everyone on it was shrinking as well.

"We have to evacuate, quick!"

But unfortunately, there were no knightmares on the roof. They had to walk all the way down and the building was shrinking at an alarming rate. A loud booming noise accompanied with a rumble woke him from his thoughts. Looking behind, he saw two giant, white boots. His gaze wandered up to eventually find C.C.'s expressionless eyes.

"C.C., how...?", he started. But the green-haired girl grabbed him and Kallen, who had already shrunken down to a few inches tall. "I am not affected by Geass, remember?" With that, she just jumped down the building, which by now was only a few meters high. She then quickly ran behind the rebel's lines. Finally, Zero came back to his senses. "Damn, why haven't you been faster." A stare of C.C. silenced him. At her size, she was pretty intimidating. "Be grateful I wasn't slower."

Zero looked back. The building had stopped shrinking and was not much bigger than C.C.'s boots. If he were still on there... Behind the empty place where the skyscraper once stood, Cornelia's massive form rose into the air. "Hm, maybe I should have targeted a larger area."

Zero cursed. "Damn! I can't let strategy loose against the sheer power of one person. How can we defeat a power like that?" The question was aimed at C.C.. The green-haired girl seemed to think for a while before answering. "That is a form of Geass I thought could never exist. I'm not sure how it works, but maybe... maybe I could at least create a Geass that can counter it."

Zero nodded. "Fine. Then give it to me." The witch shook her head. "No, that's not possible. You already have one. But she can have it." C.C. looked at Kallen. The redhead looked at Zero. Her eyes told him that she was willing to accept it. "Ok, Kallen. I believe in you." A thunderous "Ahem!" caught his attention. "Oh, and in you too, C.C.!"

The mark on the green-haired witch's forehead then began to glow as she bestowed Kallen with the new Geass. "Ok, try it out." Kallen's Geass glowed and slowly, she and Zero grew bigger and bigger. After a short while, C.C. had to place them down and eventually, they were back to normal. "Excellent.", Zero said enthusiastically. "Now, bring her down to size." He pointed at Cornelia who had now reached the rebels.

The purple-haired goddess lifted one of her white boots. "Time to die, bu-uh?" She started dwindling in size. Loosing her balance, she put her foot back down and took a step back. "No way!" Her Geass was glowing again and her shrinking stopped. "What's going on?", Zero asked, looking at C.C. She looked at Cornelia. "The Geass' are interfering. Kallen uses her Geass to reverse Cornelia's growth, but simultaneously, Cornelia uses her Geass to grow again." Zero thought about that. "So as long as Kallen keeps this up, Cornelia is stuck at that size. Fine, then we have a chance now! All rebel forces, ATTACK!"

info.brief_description: The Return of my old interactive. Growth and Shrink inside! I Command you........ADD!!!
info.description:
The return of my first interactive which got deleted over a year ago. My Code Geass Size Interactive! The premise is simple, a character is either going to shrink or grow and we're going to write what happens. Before we start though a few ground rules.

-NO MALE GIANTS. A man can shrink but he can only interact with girls, and only girls can grow.

-No scat or toilet material.

-Don't use too many curse words in a single add.

-Unless they are choice chapters, no single sentence adds.

-Nothing gay, except for yuri aka girlxgirl. I approve.

-You will get compensated for your add, in some way I can manage. But payment will vary according to the add itself.

-Please at least try to keep people in character, or at least give a reason they aren't.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is all I can think of for now so I look forward to adds and may this interactive blossom!
